nodes.text: Hero of Tython's Defender-class light corvette

The Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython owned a Defender-class light corvette during the Cold War and the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Gifted to the Knight by General Var Suthra of the Republic Military, the Defender-class corvette served as the home and mobile base of the Hero and the five other crew members that would join the Jedi throughout the Knight's travels.
